properties.entry: SELECT BOARD_NO,BOARD_TITLE,BOARD_CONTENT,TO_CHAR(CREATED_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CREATED_DT,READ_COUNT,MEMBER_NM,QA_STATUS,WONDER_TYPE FROM BOARD JOIN WONDER_BOARD USING(BOARD_NO) JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE WONDER_TYPE ='Type1자유 궁금증' AND BOARD_CD='4' AND BOARD_ST = '1'
SELECT TAG_NAME, BOARD_NO FROM HASHTAG JOIN WONDER_BOARD USING(BOARD_NO) JOIN BOARD USING(BOARD_NO) WHERE BOARD_ST= 1 AND BOARD_CD = 4 AND WONDER_TYPE ='Type1자유 궁금증'
